title: 08/24/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 08/24/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin discusses the quarterback situation in New England right now and why the latest setback for Cam Newton perfectly sums up his NFL career. He has bad news for a promising young star in the NFL and the reason he is going to struggle this season. He also believes all the pressure is on Baker Mayfield this year to win games with a Super Bowl caliber supporting cast. Plus, former NFL linebacker Channing Crowder joins the show to tell Colin if Tua Tagovailoa is the real deal for the Dolphins and if Urban Meyer will succeed as a head coach in the NFL.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
